predicate.note: Frames file for 'predate' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry, Framenet entry Relative time.

example.name: nice
example.text: John C. Burton, an accounting professor at Columbia University's Graduate School of Business, said ``there's a lot of emotion involved in the name of an accounting firm with a long history and with roots in England, where accounting predates the U.S.''
